attributes.action: Stop bullying in and outside of school and introduce this as a criminal offence.
attributes.additional_details:
I would likento the government to make it mandatory that bullying is dealt with from first touch and that all schools have near enought the sames policies in place having a zero tollerance and expell the bully immediately where there is evidence. 
Have the victims are protected not the bully's. It is time to make a stance and stop this hurting our children some of our children are no longer with us as a result of this and it's not fair.
attributes.background:
policies to keep kids safe
“Children suffer bullying in schools, and many schools fail to act despite zero-tolerance policies. We call on the Government to make schools enforce anti-bullying policies, support victims, punish bullies, and be held accountable as bullying ruins lives.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732221
